import React from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import ManufacturerCard from'./ManufacturerCard';import manufacturersData from'./manufacturers.json';import'./Manufacturer.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Manufacturer=_ref=>{let{onSelectManufacturer}=_ref;const{categoryCode}=useParams();const selectedCategory=manufacturersData.manufacturers.flatMap(manufacturer=>manufacturer.categories).find(category=>category.code===categoryCode);if(!selectedCategory){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Categor\xEDa no encontrada."});}const filteredManufacturers=manufacturersData.manufacturers.filter(manufacturer=>manufacturer.categories.some(cat=>cat.code===selectedCategory.code&&cat.active)).sort((a,b)=>a.name.localeCompare(b.name));// Ordenar alfabéticamente por nombre
return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container-fluid mb-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Select Manufacturer"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row d-flex flex-wrap p-2",children:filteredManufacturers.map(manufacturer=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ManufacturerCard,{manufacturer:manufacturer,onSelect:()=>onSelectManufacturer(categoryCode,manufacturer.code)},manufacturer.id))})]});};export default Manufacturer;
